QuestData.Title: The Order of the Cloud Serpent
QuestData.Description: Ahhh, it seems you have found yourself the proud owner of a majestic cloud serpent.$B$BBefore you may fly the skies on this powerful creature, you must first earn the skill to ride it.$B$BThe Order of the Cloud Serpent can teach you the knowledge that you seek.$B$BIf you wish to follow our way, you should speak to Instructor Skythorn at The Arboretum in the Jade Forest.$B$BI wish you luck, $r.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: To ride a cloud serpent is a privilege given to few.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Instructor Skythorn at The Arboretum in The Jade Forest.
